title: IIT Mandi Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Mandi (IIT Mandi) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill the vacancies for Various Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. in Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Mandi Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these Posts. If you are looking for more, here...
